security: The text is redacted because the public disclosure of the redaction could reasonably be expected to constitute an unwarranted invasion of personal privacy, and that invasion of privacy would be so substantial that it outweighs the public interest.
summary: This document contains personnel records related to Richard Newcombe Billings' employment with the House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA), including his payroll authorization form and memoranda regarding his appointment.
summary_one_paragraph: This collection of documents pertains to the employment of Richard Newcombe Billings by the HSCA in 1978. It includes a payroll authorization form detailing his appointment as Editorial Chief with a $30,000 annual salary, and memoranda from I. Charles Mathews, Special Counsel, confirming his start date and salary. Additional documentation relates to payroll certifications and the requirement to disclose any relationships to current members of Congress. Social Security Numbers are redacted due to privacy concerns.
title: Staff Payroll Records Regarding Richard Newcombe Billings
recipient: Clerk of the House of Representatives, All Staff, Thomas Howarth, Elizabeth Berning
